net.sf.jasperreports.crosstabs.fill

Interface JRPercentageCalculator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JRPercentageCalculatorFactory.BigDecimalPercentageCalculator, JRPercentageCalculatorFactory.BigIntegerPercentageCalculator, JRPercentageCalculatorFactory.BytePercentageCalculator, JRPercentageCalculatorFactory.DoublePercentageCalculator, JRPercentageCalculatorFactory.FloatPercentageCalculator, JRPercentageCalculatorFactory.IntegerPercentageCalculator, JRPercentageCalculatorFactory.LongPercentageCalculator, JRPercentageCalculatorFactory.ShortPercentageCalculator

    public interface JRPercentageCalculator
    Percentage calculator interface.

    Implementing this interface is required for percentage calculations on types missing built-in support.

    Version:
    $Id: JRPercentageCalculator.java 5877 2013-01-07 19:51:14Z teodord $
    Author:
    Lucian Chirita (lucianc@users.sourceforge.net)
    See Also:
    JRPercentageCalculatorFactory

      java.lang.Object calculatePercentage(JRCalculable value, JRCalculable total)
      Calculates the percentage of a value out of a total.
